p.b: This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

tr.td: date de validité d'un code concept

div.p: This case-insensitive code system https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/TRE_A06-FormatCodeComplementaire/FHIR/TRE-A06-FormatCodeComplementaire defines the following codes:
